name: Unlucky Sniper
description:
If, which playing shooting games, you feel like the bullets are intentionally flying miss the target, then you will like this game. In the pixel game, you play for the bullet, and you should don't hit the target for as long as possible. The task is simple, but the more you're dodging, the more difficult it is. The game also has the "Reverse" mode, in which you must hit as many targets as you can in the specified time.

Enjoy and see how much you can dodge.
